description:
James`s loyal Growlithe has helped save James from Jessiebell on countless occasions. When James left his home, Growlie stayed at home in its own mansion.
James later re-encounted Growlie at one of the mansions in the Sinnoh region. It was able to smell James under his disguise. When the treasure chest turned into a mecha, James`s Growlithe was injured by one of the missiles. James told Pikachu to blast Team Rocket off to escape Jessibelle and he said goodbye to his loyal Growlithe.
name: Gardie (Kojirou)
